org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.propertysource

Class SystemPropertySource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.propertysource.BasePropertySource
      • org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.propertysource.SystemPropertySource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertySource

    public class SystemPropertySource
extends BasePropertySource
    This PropertySource manages the system properties. You can disable this feature by setting tamaya.envprops.disable or tamaya.defaults.disable.

     tamaya.envprops.disable

      • get

        Description copied from interface: PropertySource
        Access a property.
        Specified by:
        get in interface PropertySource
        Overrides:
        get in class BasePropertySource
        Parameters:
        key - the property's key, not null.
        Returns:
        the property value map, where map.current(key) == value, including also any metadata. In case a value is null, simply return null.

      • getProperties

        public Map<String,PropertyValue> getProperties()
        Description copied from interface: PropertySource
        Access the current properties as Set. The resulting Map may not return all items accessible, e.g. when the underlying storage does not support iteration of its entries. null
        Returns:
        the corresponding map, never null.

      • getVersion

        public String getVersion()
        Description copied from interface: PropertySource
        Get the current version. A new version signals that it is known that properties have changed for this property source. This is especially useful, when PropertySource.getChangeSupport() is ChangeSupport.SUPPORTED. The content and format of the version String is imeplemtation specific. We recommend to add information such as the loading timestamp, the source systems read or whatever is appropriate. By default this method returns "N/A".
        Returns:
        the version this property source, never null.

      • getChangeSupport

        public ChangeSupport getChangeSupport()
        Description copied from interface: PropertySource
        Get the support for reporting changes to property sources provided by this instance. This support type should never change during a property source's lifetime.
        Specified by:
        getChangeSupport in interface PropertySource
        Overrides:
        getChangeSupport in class BasePropertySource
        Returns:
        the change support of this property source, not null.
